book.title: GT version GridShib : System Administrator's Guide

abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with GridShib. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: The information in this GridShib Admin Guide is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the . Read through this guide before continuing!

chapter.title: Building and Installing
chapter.para: GridShib is build and installed with the Globus Toolkit by default, nothing more need be done.

chapter.title: Deploying
chapter.para: GridShib is deployed by default and requires no extra deployment.
